about_the_game:
One claims to be a circle in the Land of Lines. He has taken control of an Architect's pen and has begun drawing shapes of his own. The powerful renegade army is now conquering through the Shades of Blue leaving only destruction and turmoil in their path. It is up to you young vector! You must wield the power of the Architects, unite with the other vectors, and restore the blueprints to their proper order. We are all counting on you.

- The White Architect


Key Features

- Explore and solve puzzles in unique worlds

- Battle enemies by drawing with the various Architects' pens

- Collect vectors to assume different formations

- Rebuild the blueprints by solving jigsaw type puzzles

- Challenge yourself in the arena

- Take a break and play mini games

- A Troll

name: Vector's Adventures

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista SP1+ or higher
  • Processor: Intel 2.4 GHz, Amd FX-8350 or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: The blueprints are scattered and out of order! You must piece the worlds back together. Join Vector, a dot, the lowest form of geometry, in his adventure across the Shades of Blue as he battles a hierarchy of greater shapes. Wield the Architect's pen for puzzles and combat in the Land of Lines.
